attributes.action: We ask for all charges against Cllr Alasdair MacPherson to be investigated and dropped
attributes.additional_details:
Councillor Alasdair MacPherson organised the Stirling anti-bedroom tax march on 8 June 2013. The exceptional organisation of the event was very obvious. The instructions given to marchers prior to the vent are clear:
http://www.abolishbedroomtax.co.uk/
